Subject: Partner Connect Access - Guess MOO

 

 Caution:This email originated from outside the organization. Please do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

 

________________________________

Dear Mannan,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

We would like to request access to the Guess store in order to submit the necessary event permit request for the store opening, which is scheduled to take place on the 21st of March. Having access to the store will allow us to complete the permit request submission and ensure everything is in order for the event.

chunks.text:
We would like to request access to the Guess store in order to submit the necessary event permit request for the store opening, which is scheduled to take place on the 21st of March. Having access to the store will allow us to complete the permit request submission and ensure everything is in order for the event.

 

Your assistance in facilitating this access would be greatly appreciated.

 

Thank you in advance, and I look forward to your response.

 

Best regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

‑

Subject: Partner Connect Access - Guess MOO

 

 Caution:This email originated from outside the organization. Please do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe.

 

________________________________

Dear Mannan,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

We would like to request access to the Guess store in order to submit the necessary event permit request for the store opening, which is scheduled to take place on the 21st of March. Having access to the store will allow us to complete the permit request submission and ensure everything is in order for the event.

We would like to request access to the Guess store in order to submit the necessary event permit request for the store opening, which is scheduled to take place on the 21st of March. Having access to the store will allow us to complete the permit request submission and ensure everything is in order for the event.

 

Your assistance in facilitating this access would be greatly appreciated.

 

Thank you in advance, and I look forward to your response.

 

Best regards,

 

SALWA AL MAMARI​​​​

ASSOCIATE ‑ ADMINISTRATION

REAL EMIRATES LLC
